title: Josee to Tora to Sakana-tachi (Josee, the Tiger and the Fish)
synopsis: Equipped with his passion for diving and admiration for marine biology, university student Tsuneo Suzukawa tries his best to juggle several part-time jobs to earn enough money to study abroad. But one night, in a fateful accident, he meets a girl in a wheelchair, driving his current path into a detour.
staff: [['Tamura, Koutarou', ['Director']], ['Wakabayashi, Kazuhiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Eve', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Call, Evan', ['Music']]]
